properties.name: front.exposed-docs.base-url
properties.description: Base URL of the exposed docs microservice.

properties.name: front.exposed-docs.public-access
properties.description: Allow anonymous access to exposed docs endpoints when security is enabled.

properties.name: front.review-generation.api-base-url
properties.description: Base URL of the back-office API exposing review generation endpoints.

properties.name: front.review-generation.api-key
properties.description: API key forwarded to authenticate against the back-office API.

properties.name: front.review-generation.review-path
properties.description: Path appended to the base URL when triggering or polling review generation.

properties.name: front.review-generation.quota.max-per-ip
properties.description: Maximum number of review generations allowed per IP during the quota window.

properties.name: front.review-generation.quota.window
properties.description: Duration of the quota window used to count review generations per IP.

properties.name: front.geocode.base-url
properties.description: Base URL of the geocode microservice.

properties.name: front.search.suggest.semantic-fallback-enabled
properties.description: Enable semantic fallback for product suggestions when prefix search yields no results.

properties.name: front.google-indexation.enabled
properties.description: Enable Google Indexation dispatch in the front API.

properties.name: front.google-indexation.realtime-enabled
properties.description: Enable real-time Indexing API dispatch when a review generation succeeds.

properties.name: front.google-indexation.batch-enabled
properties.description: Enable scheduled batch dispatch of queued URLs.

properties.name: front.google-indexation.batch-size
properties.description: Maximum number of URLs to send per batch.

properties.name: front.google-indexation.max-attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of attempts before giving up on a URL.

properties.name: front.google-indexation.site-base-url
properties.description: Base URL of the public frontend used to build canonical product URLs.

properties.name: front.semantic-diagnostics-enabled
properties.description: Enable semantic score diagnostics in global search responses.
